item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 25, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Why is C the symbol for the speed of light? (2004) (50 points | 35 comments)

3. Kylie Minogue song about a typeface (7 points | discuss)

5. Were large soda lakes the cradle of life? (13 points | 4 comments)
6. Activeloop (YC S18) Is Hiring Senior Python Back End and AI Search Engineers ( | hide)
7. The Jakt Programming Language (43 points | 9 comments)
8. My Favorite C++ Pattern: X Macros (2023) (30 points | 23 comments)
9. German parliament votes as a Git contribution graph (540 points | 150 comments)
10. Hann: A Fast Approximate Nearest Neighbor Search Library for Go (47 points | 6 comments)

12. Polypane, The browser for ambitious web developers (100 points | 66 comments)
13. Search My Site – open-source search engine for personal and independent websites (215 points | 49 comments)
14. Reflecting on WikiTok (124 points | 25 comments)
15. Writing your own C++ standard library from scratch (124 points | 97 comments)
16. A study reveals that deciduous trees' roots remain active in winter (51 points | 20 comments)

23. New NASA satellite mapped the oceans like never before (14 points | discuss)
24. WWI's 'Dazzle' Camouflage Seemed Effective Due to Unexpected Optical Trick (111 points | 64 comments)
25. Brain Scans of Infants Reveal the Moment We Start Making Memories (104 points | 58 comments)
26. The Hartlib Papers (17 points | 1 comment)
27. We chose LangGraph to build our coding agent (65 points | 15 comments)
28. The Practical Limitations of End-to-End Encryption (29 points | 23 comments)
29. What Killed Innovation? (46 points | 46 comments)
